title: Open the Gates, O Forest Keeper

content.text: The journey begins. A traveler, seeking passage, pleads with the ancient guardian of a mystical forest. This song sets the stage for the trials to come, introducing the conflict between the mortal and the magical realms.
Instructions for you: You can replace this text with the actual lore. The lyrics below are integrated and will be highlighted as the song plays.
Open the gates, O Forest Keeper!
For I have journeyed far and long.
The path is lost, the light grows weaker.
And shadows sing a mournful song.
The traveler enters the hallowed gardens, a place of memory and sorrow. Here, the echoes of the past reveal glimpses of the world's history and the source of its current decay.
In gardens lost, where memories sleep,
A silent watch, the statues keep.

title: To Higher Climes Where Few Might Stand

content.text: The ascent towards a treacherous peak, a place of power where few dare to tread. This marks a turning point in the quest, a challenge against the very elements and the gods themselves.
The wind it bites, the air grows thin,
A spire of rock, a world within.
